title: Milestone Reviewer
description: Review of Statements of Milestones (SoM) and verification of proof of achievement for projects voted on by the Cardano community and funded through Project Catalyst. These projects include smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), systems, websites, educational initiatives, and various innovations aimed at strengthening and expanding the Cardano ecosystem.

title: Co-Founder & Web3 Trainer
description: I contribute to the growth of the Cardano ecosystem by supporting onboarding initiatives and guiding new members through practical setup, blockchain fundamentals, and ecosystem opportunities. As a speaker at Goma Hub events, I deliver structured sessions on Cardano's technology, governance, and development framework, making complex concepts accessible to developers and community members. I also coordinate event communications, ensuring clear messaging, strong engagement, and effective knowledge transfer to strengthen local blockchain capacity.

title: Community Moderator
description: I ensure clear and effective communication across Safrochain channels and groups. Respond to community questions and provide guidance on Safrochain. Participate in moderating missions on Safrochain Hub and contribute ideas aimed at improving the Safrochain ecosystem.
